text: The Belokurikha is a river in Russia. It flows through the Smolensk region of the Altai Territory . The mouth of the river is from the mouth of the Peschanaya river on the right bank. The length of the river is . On the banks is the resort town of Belokurikha. == References == * Nature Belokurikha on the city photos Category:Rivers of Russia
title: Belokurikha (river)
